resources.string:
This app set up a bootless root with Magisk and Mtk-su (by Diplomatic@Xda) on MediaTek Android devices.

 Required to manage root access for each application, you must download Magisk manager v7.1.1.

 Supported Chipsets MT6735, MT6737, MT6738, MT6739, MT6750, MT6753, MT6755, MT6757, MT6758, MT6761, MT6762, MT6763, MT6765, MT6771, MT6779, MT6795, MT6797, MT6799, MT8163, MT8167, MT8173, MT8176, MT6580, MT6595
Do not update Magisk through Magisk Manager on a locked bootloader or you will brick your device. Including, i am not liable for any kind of damage to your device
